snippet: Houston’s run to the playoffs last season set the stage for what the Texans now expect: to rise into the upper echelon of the N.F.L.’s American Conference.
abstract: Houston Texans' playoff run last season set the stage for high expectations this year.
lead_paragraph: Houston’s run to the playoffs last season set the stage for what the Texans now expect: to rise into the upper echelon of the N.F.L.’s American Conference.

headline.seo: The Texans, After Tasting the Playoffs for the First Time, Want Seconds
headline.main: For Texans, Playoff Lost and Perspective Gained
headline.print_headline: For Texans, Playoff Lost And Perspective Gained
